statements: SELECT * FROM customs_data;
SELECT customs_id, import_country, export_country FROM customs_data;
SELECT item_description, item_value FROM customs_data WHERE import_country='USA';
SELECT * FROM customs_data ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM customs_data;
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE import_country = 'USA';
SELECT customs_id, item_description, item_value FROM customs_data WHERE export_country = 'China' ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*), import_country FROM customs_data GROUP BY import_country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT export_country FROM customs_data ORDER BY export_country;
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE item_value > 1000 AND tariff_code LIKE '12%';
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE import_activity = 'Import' AND tariff > 50.00
SELECT customs_office, export_activity FROM customs_data WHERE id = 10
SELECT id, customs_office, import_activity FROM customs_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM tariffs WHERE country_origin = 'USA' AND country_destination = 'Canada'
SELECT id, description FROM tariffs WHERE tariff_code LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE tariff >= 100.50 ORDER BY customs_office ASC
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE import_activity = 'Import' OR export_activity = 'Export'
SELECT customs_office, tariff FROM customs_data INNER JOIN tariffs ON customs_data.tariff = tariffs.id WHERE tariffs.country_origin = 'USA'
SELECT id, customs_office, tariff FROM customs_data WHERE tariff BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT customs_office, tariff, description FROM customs_data JOIN tariffs ON customs_data.id = tariffs.id WHERE customs_office LIKE '%Port%'
SELECT * FROM customs_data;
SELECT id, country_code, import_tariff FROM customs_data WHERE import_tariff > 0;
SELECT country_code, import_tariff, export_tariff FROM customs_data WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT * FROM import_activities ORDER BY import_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM export_activities WHERE export_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, country_code, import_tariff FROM customs_data WHERE import_tariff > 0.5 ORDER BY country_code ASC
SELECT id, import_id, imported_item, import_date FROM import_activities WHERE import_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY import_date DESC
SELECT id, export_id, exported_item, export_date FROM export_activities WHERE export_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY export_date ASC
SELECT id, country_code, import_tariff FROM customs_data WHERE export_tariff IS NOT NULL ORDER BY import_tariff DESC
SELECT * FROM import_activities WHERE import_customs_code LIKE '%A%'
SELECT * FROM import_activities;
SELECT import_id, imported_product, quantity FROM import_activities WHERE customs_clearance_status = 'pending';
SELECT export_date, exported_product, destination_country FROM export_activities ORDER BY export_date DESC;
SELECT id, import_country, export_country, customs_status FROM customs_data WHERE customs_status = 'pending' ORDER BY import_country ASC;
SELECT tariff_id, country, product_name, tariff_rate, effective_date FROM tariffs WHERE tariff_rate > 10 ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customs_data WHERE customs_status='Cleared';
SELECT id, import_country, export_country FROM customs_data WHERE shipment_id='12345';
SELECT * FROM tariffs WHERE country='USA' AND effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT export_date, exported_product, destination_country FROM export_activities WHERE shipping_status='Shipped';
SELECT import_id, import_date, imported_product, quantity FROM import_activities WHERE customs_clearance_status='Pending' ORDER BY import_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customs_Data;
SELECT importer_name, exporter_name, shipment_qty FROM Customs_Data WHERE shipment_qty > 100;
SELECT entry_id, shipment_value, customs_clearance_date FROM Customs_Data WHERE customs_clearance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Tariffs ORDER BY tariff_id DESC;
SELECT tariff_description, import_tariff, export_tariff FROM Tariffs WHERE import_tariff > export_tariff;
SELECT * FROM Customs_Data WHERE shipment_qty > 100 AND customs_clearance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT importer_name, exporter_name, shipment_qty FROM Customs_Data WHERE exporter_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY shipment_qty DESC;
SELECT entry_id, shipment_value FROM Customs_Data WHERE shipment_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY entry_id ASC;

SELECT c.country_name, c.currency, i.import_date FROM Countries c JOIN Import_Activities i ON c.country_id = i.entry_id WHERE i.import_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY i.import_date DESC;
SELECT t.tariff_description, t.import_tariff, e.export_quantity FROM Tariffs t JOIN Export_Activities e ON t.tariff_id = e.entry_id WHERE e.export_quantity < 50 ORDER BY e.export_quantity ASC;
